ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( Q e. Prime -> Q e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_prmdvdsexp | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. ZZ /\ N e. NN ) -> ( P || ( Q ^ N ) <-> P || Q ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( P || ( Q ^ N ) <-> P || Q ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_prmuz2 | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dvdsprm | |- ( ( P e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( P || Q <-> P = Q ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime ) -> ( P || Q <-> P = Q ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( P || Q <-> P = Q ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ Q e. Prime /\ N e. NN ) -> ( P || ( Q ^ N ) <-> P = Q ) ) |
